Bauble code

A web-design framework for those who are passionate about jewelry.

If you like to consign, design, create, or resell jewelry treasures, Bauble Code is all about helping you create a unique, beautiful website to amp up your sales and build your brand.

There’s no better option. Using a third party seller like Etsy or eBay is less professional than having your own site, and those sites charge additional listing fees. Hiring someone to code your website is expensive. Other framework options aren’t specific to jewelry sales.

With Bauble Code, the special needs of jewelry sellers come first. There’s an attractive interface, easy point of sale setups, big photo views, and SEO options to help draw buyers. It’s there in an easy, pre-made website framework that you click into place, giving you a website that’s ready to go. See how you can build sales and create a great brand. Bauble Code will makes your sales grow!

Fast

Our carefully designed pre-made framework allows for quick creation of a stunning website, without spending endless hours coding.

Easy

It’s easy to use because all the hard coding has already been done. Create something beautiful for your jewelry brand, with just a few clicks

Scalable

Plan to make your business grow? This framework is specially designed to accommodate business growth without constant changes.
